sx.ip.proxies

Class ProxyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.ip.proxies.ProxyManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinuxProxyManager, MacProxyManager, WindowsProxyManager

    public abstract class ProxyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Proxy Manager Super class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProxyManager.ProxySetupException
      Exception that happens when something goes bad when setting a proxy on the OS level.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ProxyManager()
      Create a instance of ProxyManager, but, as this is a singleton, can be only called by the class itself.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods

      static ProxyManager getInstance()
      Return the ProxyManager for the current user OS
      abstract ProxySettings getProxySettings()
      Reads the proxy settings from the OS for the current user

      Set the proxy options into the operation system settings for the current user.

    • Method Detail

      • setProxySettings

        public abstract boolean setProxySettings(ProxySettings settings)
                                  throws ProxyManager.ProxySetupException
        Set the proxy options into the operation system settings for the current user.
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings list
        Returns:
        True of the operation was successful. False if something couldn't be set.
        Throws:
        ProxyManager.ProxySetupException - If something goes really bad.

      • getProxySettings

        public abstract ProxySettings getProxySettings()
                                        throws ProxyManager.ProxySetupException
        Reads the proxy settings from the OS for the current user
        Returns:
        The current proxy settings that are set on the OS for the current user.
        Throws:
        ProxyManager.ProxySetupException - If something goes really bad.

      • getInstance

        public static ProxyManager getInstance()
                                throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Return the ProxyManager for the current user OS
        Returns:
        The ProxyManager for the current OS user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If something goes really bad.
